title: A comparison of molecular iodine evolution on the chemistry of lead and tin perovskites
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE03004K, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Thomas Webb, Saif A. Haque
The development of new strategies which target simultaneous adsorption of corrosive iodine (I2), facilitate reduction into I− and reintroduction within the crystal lattice are highly promising for addressing the longevity of perovskite-based devices.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
